Entries.Alex: #$c .5#Hmmph. This is not good weather for sports, but... oh well, I can always lift weights inside.#Days like this let the truly dedicated show their mettle.#$b#What? I know some words.

Entries.Sun6: @, you planning on watching the game? The {{i18n:sports.team.{{Random:01, 02, 03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 08|key=sports_team}} }} are playing the {{i18n:sports.team.{{Random:02, 03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 08, 01|key=sports_team}} }}! I'm so excited!
Entries.4_2: @! I saw a new exercise on social media the other day. Can't wait to try it out.
Entries.6_2: There's nothing like a nice early morning run.$h

Entries.spring_Sun4: It's an election year, @!#$b#Do I think the Governor is going to get re-elected? Of course I do, he always gets re-elected.
